sentences.en: First the curtains caught on fire and then bedclothes.
sentences.cn: 首先窗帘着火了,之后床单也跟着燃烧起来.

sentences.en: First the curtains took fire and then the bedclothes.
sentences.cn: 窗帘首先着了火,接着被单也着火了.
他藏入棉被下面;他钻进棉被中.

sentences.en: He threw back the bedclothes and jumped out of bed.
I changed the bedclothes after I had slept in them for a week.
sentences.cn: 我每周都换一次我睡过的床上用品.

sentences.en: Momma was cleaning inside, changing the bedclothes.
sentences.cn: 妈妈在里面清扫，换卧具。

sentences.en: Olly: Your feet are sticking out of the bedclothes.
sentences.cn: 欧利: 你的脚在被子外面呢.

sentences.en: Our company's Bedclothes will Be with you in spending the finest hours.
sentences.cn: 本公司的床上用品,与您共度最美好的时光.

sentences.en: She sat up in bed and threw back the bedclothes.
sentences.cn: 她在床上坐起,把被子掀开.

sentences.en: She threw the bedclothes back and jumped out of bed.
sentences.cn: 她掀开被子,一跃下了床.

sentences.en: The baby is picking at the bedclothes.
The bedclothes catch fire and the whole house may be burnt down.
sentences.cn: 先是床单着火,然后整个房子可能被烧毁.

sentences.en: The bedclothes caught fire and the whole house was burnt down.
sentences.cn: 寝具引起火灾,并且整个房子都烧毁了.

sentences.en: The bedclothes were tumbled as though the bed had been slept in.
sentences.cn: 床上的被褥都弄乱了,好像有人睡过觉.

sentences.en: The maid turned back the bedclothes ready for the night.
sentences.cn: 女佣把盖被掀开以备主人就寝.
这床铺盖是非常干净的.

trans.tran_en: the sheets, covers etc that you put on a bed
